content: 1 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk and 6 remaining original toe sts are on one needle shaft k to end needle 3 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 4 k1 ssk k to end 4 sts decreased finishing round 2 k to end cut yarn leaving a tail approx 12 / 30 5 cm in length kitchner stitch / graft rem sts together repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 32 sts rem repeat round 1 only until 12 sts rem weave in ends block if needed 3 share m o e n dia #k s n o w it c t i e t i r h a el l l a h su a m s m h e t r a ca g mpsocks if you like this pattern check out… summer s end shawl visit knitterella com for more original patterns for knitters kni-pat35 summer camp socks | version 2 tech editing by dori kershner / email florydori@gmail com graphic design & photography by jill zielinski / www jillzielinskidesigns com © 2019 by jill zielinski / knitterella® | graphic design & photography by jill zielinski | web knitterella com | email knitterella@knitterella com all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission
